     URL/Description:                                                                              
 
This includes full uncut interviews with simon cowell and lewis hamilton, footage from the fastest lap on the top gear track, footage from the eurorfighter cockpit when it raced the bughatti veyron and footage from the best road to drive on in the world with the lamborgini.

 1. At NOsegmenT we do not believe in segmenting, segmenting is whereby you record a tv show and   
    press stop when the adbreak comes on, then encode that, whilst its encoding you press record   
    to record the next part of the tv show after the commericial break, once the encode for the    
    1st part is done youupload it to an ftp even when the show is still airing and do this for     
    each segment of the show thenrun a script to merge the .avi's together into 1. This often      
    results in shows going out of sync aftercommercial breaks, which happens quite often. Also you 
    have to predict how long each section of theshow will be e.g 9mins for segment 1, 13mins for   
    segment 2 and then choose a filsize e.g 70mb forsection 1 and 104mb for section 2. You need to 
    know the length before hand in order to choose the correct filesize, otherwise you may have    
    some sections with 650 bitrate and others with 1050 which is uneven and ruins caps. Shows      
    arent always the same length each week and 1-off shows are impossible to predict. For these    
    reasons we do not segment as this is an evil thing, we believe in quality over speed.          
                                                                                                   
    For more information about segmenting check google.                                            
                                                                                                   
 2. At NOsegmenT we believe in informing users of any problems that we know of in the release nfo, 
    rather than pretend its perfect.                                                               
                                                                                                   
 3. At NOsegmenT we believe in stating the properties of our video encodes fully e.g bitrates      
    precise runtimes, resolutions etc which all groups should do!
